seo.title: Application Success — Filecoin Plus
seo.description: General DataCap application form with a selected notary.

page_content.heading: Congratulations, you've sucessfully applied for |data| of DataCap

unverified.tooltip: Optionally, you can get DataCap even faster by performing KYC verification through Togggle. KYC is not required. However, applicants that have passed KYC are more likely to be approved quickly. You’ll only need to perform KYC once. It will be applied to every application you make moving forward. |link|

verifying.tooltip: It looks like your KYC verification is currently in progress. |link|

failure.tooltip: You are not eligible for KYC verification at this time. If you feel that this is a mistake, please |link| to the Filecoin plus team.

success.tooltip: Thanks for being a verified user of the Filecoin Plus program. Being verified means faster approvals and shorter time to DataCap.
